definition[0]: if a loud sound reverberates, it is heard many times as it is sent back from different surfaces
example[0]: The bang reverberated through the house.
definition[1]: if a room, building etc reverberates, it seems to shake because of a loud sound
definition[2]: if an event, action, or idea reverberates, it has a strong effect over a wide area and for a long time
example[2]: The events of 9/11 will reverberate through history.
